#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{ 
long long int n;
cin>>n;
vector<bool>a(n+1,true);
 a[0]=a[1]=false;
 int i,j;
 for(i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
    if (a[i]==true)
      for (j=i*i;j<=n;j=j+i)
            a[j]=false;
       
      long long int p=0;
      long long int sum=0;
      while(p<=n)
         { 
            if(a[p])
              { 
                 sum=sum+p;
                }
             p=p+1;
         }
     cout<<sum<<"\n";
     
    }
